title: Let's Go Sailing
brief_description: Australia 11’s coaching consultant and the 1984 Australian Olympic sailing coach, Mike Fletcher, introduces us to boatcraft and the elements of sailing. He presents the full range of basic knowledge necessary to enable us to take a sail boat onto the water.
